Translation:
This disables certain incompatible ANSI C keywords and features, along with rarely used ANX trigraphs like those indicating UNIX and VAX, in GNU CC. (In a hosted environment, all standard libraries are accessible, and the main function returns an int value. In contrast, a freestanding environment has no standard library, and the program entry need not be main. A notable example is an operating system kernel.)'.
